MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in  L23 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:26PM. Our engineers are on site and have managed to restore supplies to a number of properties, they have confirmed there is a fault on the underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to the repairs we now expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:33PM on 22nd February 2021
